content.text: 0) Preheat a grill for high heat.
1) In a large bowl, mix together the Cheddar cheese, Parmesan cheese, onion, egg, ketchup, Worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "mix"@20:23 / AC
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a large bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the Cheddar cheese"@33:51 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "Parmesan cheese"@53:68 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "onion"@70:75 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "egg"@77:80 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "ketchup"@82:89 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "Worcestershire sauce"@91:111 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "salt"@113:117 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "pepper"@122:128 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Crumble in the ground beef, and mix together by hand.
3) Form into 6 patties, and wrap a slice of bacon around each one.
5) Place patties on the grill, and cook for 5 minutes per side, or until well done.
content.eamr:
( inst-5 / R
	:inform ( ac-5-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( "patties"@9:16 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-5-0 "the grill"@20:29 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-5-1 "cook"@35:39 / AC
		:duration ( dur-5-0 "5 minutes"@44:53 / DUR )
		:until ( cond-5-0 "until well done"@67:82 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( "per side"@54:62 / OTHER )
)

content.text: 6) Remove toothpicks before serving on hamburger buns.
